  .sq-btn:active{ transform:translateY(0) scale(.99) }

<style>
  /* Esconde o cart√£o de login assim que houver sess√£o ativa */
  html.logged #login-form { display: none !important; }
</style>

<script>
(function selfQuizSessionize(){
  const KEY = "student_id";
  const BTN_ID = "start-selfquiz-btn";
  const MAX_MS = 15000;         // para de checar ap√≥s 15s
  const TICK_MS = 300;

  function syncLocalToSession() {
    try {
      const lsVal = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
      const ssVal = sessionStorage.getItem(KEY);
      if (lsVal && !ssVal) {
        sessionStorage.setItem(KEY, lsVal);
        localStorage.removeItem(KEY);
      }
    } catch (e) {}
  }

  function updateUI() {
    const sid = sessionStorage.getItem(KEY);
    if (!sid) return false;

    // Marca como logado ‚Üí esconde o card de login via CSS
    document.documentElement.classList.add('logged');

    // Atualiza o href do bot√£o com student_id (+ slide_id, se houver)
    const btn = document.getElementById(BTN_ID);
    if (btn) {
      const baseHref = btn.getAttribute('data-base') || btn.getAttribute('href');
      try {
        const url = new URL(baseHref); // baseHref √© absoluto (Worker)
        url.searchParams.set('student_id', sid);
        if (typeof SLIDE_ID !== 'undefined') url.searchParams.set('slide_id', SLIDE_ID);
        // opcional: cache-buster
        url.searchParams.set('_', Date.now().toString());
        btn.setAttribute('href', url.toString());
      } catch (e) {
        // fallback b√°sico
        const sep = baseHref.includes('?') ? '&' : '?';
        btn.setAttribute('href',
          baseHref + sep + 'student_id=' + encodeURIComponent(sid) +
          (typeof SLIDE_ID !== 'undefined' ? '&slide_id=' + encodeURIComponent(SLIDE_ID) : '')
        );
      }
    }
    return true;
  }

  // Passo 1: migra, tenta atualizar UI j√° de cara
  syncLocalToSession();
  if (updateUI()) return;

  // Passo 2: faz um polling leve por alguns segundos, esperando o login terminar
  const t0 = Date.now();
  const id = setInterval(() => {
    syncLocalToSession();
    if (updateUI() || (Date.now() - t0) > MAX_MS) clearInterval(id);
  }, TICK_MS);
})();
</script>
